Description.English: Diplomacy Expansion & Sabotage: Includes my mods: AI-P Free Beg CeaseFire (Serp), Shorter CeaseFire/NonAttack (Serp), DiploActions Embassy (Serp), P Reward Destroy Pirate (Serp), P Pirate Demands (Serp), Sabotage
Description.German: Diplomatie Erweiterung & Sabotage: Beinhaltet meine Mods: AI-P Kostenloses Waffenstillstand Betteln (Serp), KÃ¼rzerer Waffenstillstand/NichtAngriff (Serp), DiploActions Botschaft (Serp), P Belohnung Piraten Vernichten (Serp), P Piraten Forderungen (Serp), Sabotage

KnownIssues.English: Never load and play with the first Autosave of a new game. It is heavily bugged and also causes problem for many of my mods.
To better detect spies you can use Sonar, but if you dont own the SunkenTreasures DLC these detection-waves are not displayed.
Commanding multiple Police Units at once: Voice is about being a fleet and they leave a huge gap between them and also patrol for them and spy is hard. I dont know a way to fix this.

changelog.1.001:
Add ModioResourceId and changelog to modinfo.json
Fix the bug that -change owner- did not work. Now gifting ships, selling/buying ships and getting control of support fleet should work like intended.
changelog.1.002: Fix the bug that you were no longer able to buy a new flagship from neutral traders (my new code prevented it because flagship in general is not sellable, but in this case its intended to allow the buy..)
